title: A collection of chronical diseases viz. the colick, the bilious colick, hysterick diseases, the gout, and the bloody urine from the stone in the kidnies / by J. Pechey ...
author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.
publisher: Printed by J.R., and are to be sold by Henry Bonwicke ...,
notes: "The first chapter is taken from Riverius, the other from the worthy Dr. Sydenham's works" Cf. Advertisement.
